metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44444 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
[GIMP PSP File Parsing Off-By-One Remote Code Execution Vulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
gimp-data - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gimp package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.30-1ubuntu0.1').
